title: [Ta'Vaalor, Amaranth Wey]
description: A small fountain presides over the intersection of cobbled streets, its centerpiece a carved marble statue of Phoen.  The thick, low walls of the fountain provide a lovely resting spot from which to watch the passersby as they move along the wey.

A small fountain presides over the intersection of cobbled streets, its centerpiece a carved marble statue of Phoen.  The thick, low walls of the fountain provide a lovely resting spot from which to watch the moonlight reflect upon the shimmering pool.

A small fountain is blackened with soot, and its waters are thick and filthy with ash.  A few city workers are cleaning the Phoen statue at its center.  A number of guardsmen oversee the effort, keeping a keen eye on their surroundings.

A small fountain presides over the intersection of cobbled streets, its centerpiece a carved marble statue of Phoen.  The thick, low walls of the fountain provide an ideal resting spot from which to watch the moonlight reflect upon the shimmering pool.  A number of guardsmen patrol the area in front of a mithril gate on the north side of the var, while a tree-lined path leads away from the south.

A small fountain presides over the intersection of cobbled streets, its centerpiece a carved marble statue of Phoen.  The thick, low walls of the fountain provide an ideal resting spot from which to watch the passersby as they move along the wey.  A number of guardsmen patrol the area in front of a mithril gate on the north side of the var, while a tree-lined path leads away from the south.
